actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts received by members of certain firefighting and rescue units.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income compensation received by a volunteer fire fighter for service as a member of a State or local fire department.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts received by members of certain firefighting and rescue units.
